title: I Reincarnated as the Little Sister of a Death Game Manga’s Murder Mastermind and Failed - Novel Updates
genre: Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   School Life
tags: Adapted to Manga   Brother Complex   Cold Love Interests   Complex Family Relationships   Cruel Characters   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Mob Protagonist   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Obsessive Love   Older Love Interests   Overprotective Siblings   Popular Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Psychopaths   Reincarnation   Siblings   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Sister Complex
author: Inaida Sou   稲井田そう
description:
One day, Mai remembers that her perfect stepbrother is a character in a death game manga and that one year later he will hold a death game involving all of his classmates, killing his sister in the process. Mai plans a variety of surprises for her stepbrother every day based on what he said in the manga, “Nothing unexpected happened, so I was bored,” but as the days go by, he begins to show abnormal signs…

Only I know what my brother’s really like!>
